name: Le Pugbug Fly! - Adventure Run of a Tiny Flying Puppy Pug Ladybug
name_original: Le Pugbug Fly! - Adventure Run of a Tiny Flying Puppy Pug Ladybug
description:
Join pugbug on his tiny flying adventure! Help guide our hero past monsters and obstacles, just flap those wings to fly!

FEATURES

> 5 different level themes each with their own set of obstacles
> 24 different types of enemies
> Eat cheeseburgers and gain bubble power-ups to get high scores
> Game center leaderboard

Having problems or want to leave us some feedback on a future update? We would love to hear from you! You can shoot us an email at support@yololabs.com.
